author: Albert Einstein
message: Anyone who has never made a mistake has never tried anything new.

author: L.M. Montgomery
message: Isn't it nice to think that tomorrow is a new day with no mistakes in it yet?

author: Mahatma Gandhi
message: Freedom is not worth having if it does not include the freedom to make mistakes.

author: Bram Stoker
message: We learn from failure, not from success!

author: Salvador Dal_
message: Have no fear of perfection - you'll never reach it.

author: Brandon Mull
message: But the real sharp ones learn from the mistakes of others.

author: Rita Mae Brown
message: Good judgment comes from experience, and experience comes from bad judgment.

author: Sophocles
message: All men make mistakes, but a good man yields when he knows his course is wrong, and repairs the evil. The only crime is pride.

author: Rudyard Kipling
message: at least, never one that I couldn't explain away afterwards.

author: Roy T. Bennett
message: It takes guts and humility to admit mistakes. Admitting we're wrong is courage, not weakness.

author: Jim Morrison
message: Some of the worst mistakes in my life were haircuts

author: Joe Abercrombie
message: I have learned all kinds of things from my many mistakes.The one thing I never learn is to stop making them.

author: Bill Gates
message: Your most unhappy customers are your greatest source of learning.

author: Mel Brooks
message: As long as the world is turning and spinning, we're gonna be dizzy and we're gonna make mistakes.

author: Kurt Vonnegut
message: And a step backward, after making a wrong turn, is a step in the right direction.

author: William Jordan
message: Mistakes are the growing pains of wisdom.

author: Jeffrey Archer
message: We all make mistakes but one has to move on.

author: Vic Johnson
message: In life, there are no mistakes, only lessons.

author: Maxwell Maltz
message: You make mistakes, mistakes don't make you

author: Jean Kerr
message: I make mistakes;I'll be the second to admit it.

author: Winston S. Churchill
message: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.

author: Albert Einstein
message: Try not to become a man of success. Rather become a man of value.

author: Herman Melville
message: It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation.

author: W.P. Kinsella
message: Success is getting what you want, happiness is wanting what you get

author: Salvador Dal_
message: Have no fear of perfection - you'll never reach it.

author: Winston S. Churchill
message: Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.

author: Coco Chanel
message: Don't spend time beating on a wall, hoping to transform it into a door.

author: Walt Disney Company
message: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.

author: Mark Twain
message: All you need in this life is ignorance and confidence;then success is sure.

author: Roy T. Bennett
message: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.

author: Leonardo da Vinci
message: It had long since come to my attention that people of accomplishment rarely sat back and let things happen to them.They went out and happened to things.

author: Theodore Roosevelt
message: It is hard to fail, but it is worse never to have tried to succeed.

author: Robert F. Kennedy
message: Only those who dare to fail greatly can ever achieve greatly.

author: Orson Scott Card
message: If you try and lose then it isn't your fault. But if you don't try and we lose, then it's all your fault.

author: Winston S. Churchill
message: Kites rise highest against the wind, not with it.

author: Steve Maraboli
message: f you hang out with chickens, you're going to cluck and if you hang out with eagles, you're going to fly.

author: Dalai Lama XIV
message: Judge your success by what you had to give up in order to get it.

author: Abraham Lincoln
message: Always bear in mind that your own resolution to succeed is more important than any one thing.

author: Jason Mraz
message: You're not obligated to win. You're obligated to keep trying. To the best you can do everyday.

author: Joyce Brothers
message: Success is a state of mind. If you want success, start thinking of yourself as a success.
